Trustee_0.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated my ability to secure a favorable profit while adhering to the agreed-upon distribution plan. Retaining 40% of the profits showcased my competence in managing investments, reinforcing my reputation as a pragmatic and calculating trustee who can deliver on promises without undermining the investor's interests.

Investor_16.name: Robert Miller
Investor_16.content: The investor displayed a willingness to engage in a mutually beneficial transaction by accepting the proposed allocation plan, indicating some trust. However, since this was their first interaction, their reputation remains unformed and may evolve in future transactions based on the outcomes of their investments.
